archiefmat.titel: Staat der bevolking van het etablissement Batavia, gelegen aan de rivier Coppenanno, bestemd tot opname der 'besmettelingen'
archiefmat.titel_eng: Return of the population of the Batavia establishment, intended for the admission of 'those infected with leprosy', located at the Coppename River
archiefmat.notes:
Date: 31 December 1833

 

This establishment was intended in the first place to keep those infected with leprosy, whites as well as non-whites, secluded. The regulations for this asylum and the instructions for its director were drawn up by resolution of the Governor-General of the West Indian possessions on 29 December 1828.
